name: The Forgotten Forest Redux Pt.2
description:
THIS DEMO IS MAPPED FOR ANY GAMEPAD. Mouse and keyboard functionality not yet available! CONTROLS AT THE BOTTOM!

Hi and thanks for having a play with the latest iteration of my hack'n'slash project The Forgotten Forest!

I've taken a bunch of feedback from the last demo and there's now more content to play with with the core gameplay loop built around weapon pick ups and improvised weapons! In this demo, kill all the enemies in the bandit camp and collect the map! ANY feedback is as always greatly appreciated!

In the next iteration of the game I'll be looking to add mouse and keyboard functionality, quests and a hub village (Along side improvements, bug fixes, and more improvised weapons)

Thanks for playing

Be excellent to each other!

Jack & Bill and Ted

Controls are in the screen shots but also here!
